issue.title: [Python] Provide pre-commit hooks that check flake8
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2535](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2535). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should provide pre-commit hooks that users can install (optionally) that check e.g. flake8 and clang-format.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2535?focusedCommentId=16460585) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
`[~wesmckinn]` I remember that you have some code in this direction. Can you post this again? I would then turn this into a pre-commit hook and add some documentation.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2535?focusedCommentId=16464027) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
`[~xhochy]` Might be an overkill, but https://pre-commit.com/ works pretty well. There are plugins for flake8 and clang-format: https://pre-commit.com/hooks.html

Sample config: https://github.com/daskos/daskos/blob/master/.pre-commit-config.yaml

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2535?focusedCommentId=16658233) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
I will do `clang-format` in a separate PR, limiting the scope of this to `flake8`
